column3: menu has a wide variety from diner type food to higher end restaurant food. For appetizers we ordered the crab dip
column4: which is my favorite by far. It's so damn good! I always need more Ritz crackers
column5: I want to lick the plate clean after. We also got a crispy shrimp that was super delicious
column6: it didn't even need to be dipped into the dip it came with.
